name: Petit Market
description: A vibrant, bustling local market where you can find a mix of local culture, traditional crafts, fresh produce, and authentic Malian cuisine. It serves as a major hub for daily commerce.

name: Mariam (General Store)
address: Q2J2+Q9Q, Unnamed Road, Timbuktu, ML (Near Sankore Mosque)
description: A general store offering authentic local crafts, traditional Malian textiles, locally sourced spices, and delicious snacks. It serves as a cultural hub for visitors and locals.

name: Toyota Boutique
description: A retail store specializing in the sale of genuine Toyota auto parts, catering to the vehicle repair and maintenance needs of the region.

name: Istanbul pour Les Parfums et le Commerce General
description: A general commerce store that focuses on perfumes and various general goods, blending local and possibly imported products.

name: DOUCOURE ET FRERES
description: A local grocery store offering traditional Malian food products, unique finds, and everyday groceries to the community.

name: Boulangerie GDF
description: A local bakery (boulangerie) specializing in traditional Malian and possibly French-style baked goods, a key source of fresh bread for the community.

name: SOUK EL SALAAM (Market)
description: Known as the 'Market of Peace,' this is a cultural marketplace featuring a vibrant atmosphere with handmade crafts, street food, and traditional goods.

name: Local Hairdresser/Barber Shop
description: Small local establishments where people go for haircuts and styling, often identifiable by hand-painted signs with photos of various hairstyles.
